assessment_criteria.name: Principles of sustainable development
assessment_criteria.description: The project team has actively considered the principles of sustainable development in the planning, design, and construction of the project.

assessment_criteria.name: Construction management strategy
assessment_criteria.description: The project team has actively adopted a sustainability-driven approach to the development of the construction management plan for the project.

assessment_criteria.name: Selection process for designers and contractors
assessment_criteria.description: The selection process for (i) the principal Designer, (ii) the principal Contractor, and (iii) the key sub-contractor(s) included past environmental and social performance as one of the evaluation criteria.

assessment_criteria.name: Environmental and social performance in contracts
assessment_criteria.description: The contract requirements for the Designers and Contractors expressly included: achievement of specified environmental and social performance; and a requirement to monitor and report on environmental and social performance during the contract.

assessment_criteria.name: Sustainability targets for construction
assessment_criteria.description: During the concept and design process, specific targets have been set for the environmental and social performance of the project during construction. During the construction stage, progress towards the targets has been monitored, reported, and shared with the staff and workforce.

sub_credits.description: Targets set, but no formal monitoring in place.
Targets set and progress monitored, reported, and shared at the construction stage.

assessment_criteria.name: Environmental targets for key sub-contractors
assessment_criteria.description: Relevant key environmental objectives and performance targets have been set for key sub-contractors and they have been monitored against performance.

sub_credits.description: Targets set, but no formal monitoring in place.
Targets set and progress monitored, reported, and shared with the staff.

assessment_criteria.name: Sustainability targets for operation
assessment_criteria.description: During the design process, specific targets have been set for the environmental and social performance of the project during operation and there is a monitoring programme in place for the operational phase.

assessment_criteria.name: Workforce consultation on sustainability performance
assessment_criteria.description: Ongoing engagement or two-way dialogue between project staff and the construction workforce has been undertaken with regards to management of environmental and social issues and the suggestions from these discussions have been considered in the construction stage.

assessment_criteria.name: Communicating best practice
assessment_criteria.description: At each project stage, the project team has shared any innovation or best practice in sustainability-driven management and practice with other parts of the civil engineering sector or other relevant sectors.
